title: Spotify's Top 10 most viral tracks
text:
The Canadian Press - ONLINE EDITION Spotify's Top 10 most viral tracks By: The Associated Press Report Error 
The following list represents the most viral tracks on Spotify, based on the number of people who shared it divided by the number who listened to it, from Friday, Oct. 16, to Thursday, Oct. 22, via Facebook, Tumblr, Twitter and Spotify. 
CANADA 
1. B & Steve, "Home Run Anthem" (Wax Records) 
2. Marcus Marr and Chet Faker, "The Trouble with Us" (Downtown Records) 
3. Bat Boys, "OK Blue Jays" (Songline) 
4. Majical Cloudz, "Downtown" (Matador Records Ltd.) 
5. The 416 Boys, "We're Behind The Blue Jays!" (Legend North / Fontana North) 
6. Kelvin Jones, "Call You Home (Faul & Wad Ad Remix)" (Sony Music Entertainment UK Ltd.) 
7. One Direction, "Perfect" (Sony Music Entertainment UK Ltd.) 
8. Troye Sivan, "Talk Me Down" (Universal Music Australia Pty Ltd.) 
9. Tate Kobang, "Bank Rolls (Remix)" (300 Entertainment) 
10. Haley Reinhart, "Can't Help Falling in Love" (red dot) 
UNITED STATES 
1. Lukas Graham, "7 Years" (Warner Bros. Records Inc.) 
2. Marcus Marr and Chet Faker, "The Trouble with Us" (Downtown Records) 
3. Haley Reinhart, "Can't Help Falling in Love" (red dot) 
4. MO, "Kamikaze" (Sony Music Entertainment UK Ltd.) 
5. Bright Lights featuring 3LAU, "Runaway" (Dim Mak Records, Inc.) 
6. Son Little, "Lay Down" (Anti, Inc.) 
7. Gosh Pith, "Waves" (Yantra) 
8. William Singe, "679" (Over Media) 
9. Tate Kobang, "Bank Rolls (Remix)" (300 Entertainment) 
10. One Direction, "Perfect" (Sony Music Entertainment UK Ltd.) 
UNITED KINGDOM 
1. Ata Kak, "Obaa Sima" (Awesome Tapes From Africa Publishing) 
2. Alan Silvestri, "Back to the Future" (Theme Varese Sarabande) 
3. Marcus Marr and Chet Faker, "The Trouble with Us" (Downtown Records) 
4. Lukas Graham, "7 Years" (Warner Bros. Records Inc.) 
5. Jamie Lawson, "Wasn't Expecting That" (Gingerbread Man Records) 
6. Sy Ari Da Kid, "TLC" (Sy Ari Da Kid) 
7. NxWorries featuring Anderson Paak, Knxwledge, "Suede" (Stones Throw) 
8. Pumarosa, "Priestess" (Mermaid Avenue) 
9. She Wants Revenge, "Tear You Apart" (Flawless / Geffen Records) 
10. William Shatner, "Common People" (Shout! Factory LLC) 
GLOBAL 
1. Marcus Marr and Chet Faker, "The Trouble with Us" (Downtown Records) 
2. MC Faceless, MC Jout, MC Diggs, Jout Jout, "Biscoito" (Jout Jout) 
3. SAVEUS, "Levitate Me" (Universal Music Ltd.) 
4. DJ Inappropriate, "Allahu Akbar (Radio Edit)" (INAPPROPRIATE TEAM) 
5. Haley Reinhart, "Can't Help Falling in Love" (red dot) 
6. Yall featuring Gabriela Richardson, "Hundred Miles" (Sony Music Entertainment) 
7. Kurt Cobain, "And I Love Her" (Universal Music Enterprises, LLC) 
8. MO, "Kamikaze" (Sony Music Entertainment UK Ltd.) 
9. One Direction, "Perfect" (Sony Music Entertainment UK Ltd.) 
10. AnnenMayKantereit, "Oft gefragt" (Universal Music Ltd.)
